name: Control Tower (Omar)
description:
You play Hap, a magician able to conjure defense towers! The mysterious Sorcerer Dee is trying to force summon dark powers but he needs the books of knowledge! Destroy the books to keep them from Dee!  Unfortunately you are not that good a magician, you have no control of which towers you create and they cost you life force to bring them into this realm! These defense towers have trouble deciding who to attack so place them and prepare to run! Stand inside the ring for them to attack or they will idle.

Move with Arrow keys!

Place towers with Z!

Destroy towers with X!

Fill your life force bar to create a summoning circle. If summoning circle appears destroy your towers to travel to next battlefield!

BE CAREFUL!!

Wave mode to see how far you can make it!
